response: Welcome to Ola's service subscription offerings! Our Ola Care and Ola Care Plus plans offer peace of mind with comprehensive scooter diagnostics, towing, puncture assist, and theft assistance. Enjoy convenience with 24/7 ambulance service, online doctor consultation, and more. Save more with waived convenience fees and zero labor charges for non-accidental repairs. We also offer extended warranty plans for your Ola S1 and S1 Pro, covering manufacturing defects for up to five years. Enhance your ride with our range of accessories and show your Ola pride with our merchandise. Join the Ola revolution today!
title: L1.1.7 Extended Warranty, Value Added Services, Accessories and Merchandise.mp4
